headline: NYSE, Nasdaq Intend to Shut on Jan. 9 in Memory of Jimmy Carter
summary: Cboe equities exchanges also intend to close on the national day of mourning for the late former president. CME plans to alter its trading hours.

raw.headline: NYSE, Nasdaq Intend to Shut on Jan. 9 in Memory of Jimmy Carter
raw.summary: Cboe equities exchanges also intend to close on the national day of mourning for the late former president. CME plans to alter its trading hours.

headline: The New York Stock Exchange Will Close Markets on January 9 to Honor the Passing of Former President Jimmy Carter on National Day of Mourning
summary: NEW YORK, December 30, 2024--The New York Stock Exchange, part of Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (NYSE: ICE), a leading global provider of technology and data, announced today that it will close all NYSE Group equity and options markets on Thursday, January 9, 2025, in observance of the National Day of Mourning in recognition of the passing of former President Jimmy Carter.
